dct_title_s: Map of property belonging to Elizabeth Opdyke situated in the township of North Bergen, Hudson County, New Jersey
dct_description_sm: Map covers area from Dallytown Road to Bulls Ferry Dock along Bulls Ferry Road in North Bergen, New Jersey. Map shows the area of the property of Elizabeth Opdyke as well as the properties of William Mabon, Charles Haase, James E. Ward, J.D. Probst, and others.
